info.title: CUBOSFI API
info.description:
CubosFi is an API developed for the CubosFi frontend application to register customers and their charges. 

 Some useful links:
 - [The Cusbosfi repository](https://github.com/jonathan-lopes/api-cubosfi)
 - [The source API definition for the Cubosfi](https://github.com/jonathan-lopes/api-cubosfi/blob/master/swagger.json)

tags.name: User
tags.description: Resource for create, get and update user

tags.name: Customers
tags.description: Resource for create, list, update and delete customers

tags.name: Billings
tags.description: Resource for create, list, update, get and delete charges

tags.name: Refresh Token
tags.description: Resource to get additional access tokens

bearerAuth.description: Bearer authentication (also called token authentication) is an [HTTP authentication scheme](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Authentication) that involves security tokens called bearer tokens. The name “Bearer authentication” can be understood as “give access to the bearer of this token.

value.description: monetary value must be sent in cents, negative values are not accepted

example.description: Amet dolore maxime ipsum numquam earum nesciunt.

get.description: You can merge queries to get more specific results.

parameters.name: X-No-Compression
parameters.description: Does not compress the data in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number you want to get

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of items per page

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Gets all billings based on a paid or pending status

parameters.name: is_overdue
parameters.description: Gets all billings who have overdue accounts

parameters.name: due_date
parameters.description: Get all billings by a specific due date

parameters.name: after_due_date
parameters.description: Get all billings after a specific due date

parameters.name: before_due_date
parameters.description: Get all billings before a specific due date

parameters.name: due_date_start
parameters.description: Obtains billings based on a due date range, must be used together with the 'due_date_end' query parameter

parameters.name: due_date_end
parameters.description: Obtains billings based on a due date range, must be used together with the 'due_date_start' query parameter

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Gets all charges based on a specific value

parameters.name: value_lt
parameters.description: Gets all charges with values less than specified

parameters.name: value_gt
parameters.description: Gets all billings with values greater than specified

parameters.name: value_start
parameters.description: Gets the charges with the specified initial value this filter is used in conjunction with 'value_end' to return a range of values

parameters.name: value_end
parameters.description: Gets the charges with the specified final value this filter is used in conjunction with 'value_start' to return a range of values

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: timestamp at which the current rate limit window is reset.

total_pages.description: indicates the total number of pages

prev_page.description: if there is a previous page

next_page.description: if there is a subsequent page

X-Pagination.description: header with metadata about pagination, total_pages indicates the total number of pages, total_records total number of items returned, current_page number of the current page, prev_page if there is a previous page, next_page if there is a subsequent page

query.is_overdue: query.is_overdue deve ser um tipo de `boolean`, Mas o valor final foi: `"truee"`.
